transcript:
Customer: Namaste sir India Mart se bol rahe ho
Executive: Hello
Customer: Please sabse main Ruchi Singh se baat kar lo
Executive: Hello ha ji sir namaste
Customer: Namaskar
Customer: Prem babu baat kar rahe hain Prem Enterprises se
Executive: ha kar raha hun
Customer: main India Mart se baat kar raha tha Noida head office se Satish Tiwari baat kar raha hun
Executive: boliye
Executive: sir aapki ek service sambandh turant kar rahi hai aapke account manager se sir service ke regarding discussion hua tha to sir aapne feedback share kiya hai kya aap satisfy nahi hai
Customer: bilkul
Executive: to kya reason hai sir main jaan sakta hun reason ye hai ki mere ko char panch mahine ho gaye char panch mahino me India Mart ki or se ek bhi yahan se LED purchase nahi ki hui hai buyer ke dwara
Customer: koi bhi item purchase koi bhi item purchase nahi hua hai main jahan se bhi order wo aata hai buyer ka main unko baat karta hun message bhi dalta hun likh ke bhi dalta hun mail bhi karta hun lekin uska response ye aata hai requirement nahi hai
Executive: sir please ek cheez bataiye aapke yahan service kaun use karta hai aap karte hain koi employee rakh rakha hai aapne
Customer: main main main main khud hun yahan pe
Executive: aap khud hain to sir agar aap lead old lead consume karenge sir jab jab buyer ne requirement post kiya uske teen ghante char ghanta baad agar aap lead consume karenge to sir usse buyer ka to response ye hoga dusri cheez sir aapke pass to calls ke through itni inquiries aa rahi hai calls aap itna jyada miss kar rahe aap batao sir month on month
Customer: ek minute ek minute meri baat hui thi aaj meri baat hui aaj maine fir unko bola maine ki mere pass call ki bell aati hi nahi hai
Executive: call ki bell nahi aati hai acha call ki bell nahi aati hai
Customer: bell hi nahi aati hai miss call dikh jati hai main phone karta hun fir unko aisa nahi hai bell hi nahi aati hai mere pass tak mujhe pata hi nahi lagta
Executive: okay
Executive: theek hai pehli cheez to main pehli cheez to main is concern ke liye abhi internal request dal raha hun aapke pass call nahi aati hai kyuki ye last jo teen mahine ka hai concern sir ye last october se nahi october ke second week tak aapne phone uthaya hai lekin october ke third fourth fifth sixth week me aapke 10 calls sat call teen call panch call sari ki sari call miss ho rahi hai
Customer: ha to miss isliye ho rahi hai bell hi nahi aati kisi ki
Customer: jaise aapne phone kiya maine attend kiya hai na
Executive: hmm hmm hmm
Customer: kisi ka bhi phone aata hai main attend karta hu bell hi nahi aati India Mart ki or se jitne bhi phone aate hai kisi ki bell nahi aati hai miss call dekh ke main kabhi phone kar bhi leta hun aayi samajh me to uska response yahi aata hai sir ab avashyakta nahi hai
Executive: okay
Executive: plus sir dusri cheez ki ek jo buylead aapke uske liye to main concern dal raha hun sir uske liye to main abhi request dal raha hun ye check karne ke liye ki kyu aapke pass calls nahi ja rahi hain aapke pass calls aa bhi rahi hai to aap response nahi kar pa rahe hain uske liye to main dal raha hun concern
Executive: lekin isme jo lead aa rahi hai ha abhi aap naye naye hain sir abhi aapko time dena padega theek hai abhi jo kiya hai na sir keh diya aap jo services use kar rahe ho usme aapko online rehna padega aap lead kaise use karte hai jab aapke pass koi notification dekhi to aap wahan se lead consume kar lete hain sir
Customer: main online hi rehta hun hamesha
Executive: aise hi use kar rahe hain na
Customer: beech me aadhe ghante ki alag baat hai online nahi rahu waise online hi rehta hun main
Executive: ek kam kariye chalo aap online rahiye na sir to us samay pe aap India Mart ka jo buylead ka option hai buylead me ek recent lead ka tab hai us recent lead ke tab ko refresh karte rahiye sir
Customer: theek hai okay
Executive: recent kyuki usme kya hota hai na ki jaise recent lead kya hoti hai live market hai sir koi bhi requirement aayi ek requirement panch log ko hum log dete hain jaise hi koi panch log click kar de suppose abhi kisi ki buyer ne koi requirement dali abhi jo online baithe hue hain log panch log jaise hi dikha panch log click kiye dekhne ke baad fir wo lead hat jayegi wo lead ab aapko dikhegi nahi to jitne bhi quality ki leads hoti hain achi leads hoti hai badi achi requirement ki sir wo lead immediate sold out ho jati hai minute do minute panch minute ke andar uske liye sir kahin na kahin hame ghante do ghante online rehna jab aap keh rahe ho pure time aap online rehte ho to aap online rahiye recent lead ke tab ko sir refresh karte rahiye
Customer: main 9:30 ek minute 9:30 se lekar ke 6 baje tak bilkul online rehta hun aur yahan se system pe rehte hain mobile pe
Executive: ha mobile pe acha mobile pe to ek kam kariye recent mobile me buylead jayenge application me buylead me wahan recent lead ka tab hota hai usko ek bar refresh karte rahiye thodi thodi der pe refresh karte rahenge na to jaise koi bhi requirement aati hai immediate dikhegi wo consume karenge to usme conversion ho jayega
Customer: theek hai theek hai okay
Executive: aur thoda sa service use kariye baki main ye wala calls wala ek bar aapka cross check karata hun ki call wala issue kyu aa raha hai ye wala main cross check karta hun agar ye resolve ho jayega to calls bhi agar aapko mahine me 10 15 aayengi to prayas kariye usme se bhi ek aadhe me nikalte kyuki India Mart teen char tarike se business deti hai sir ek aapko calls ke through usse buyleads tisra direct inquiry aur chautha hook with catalog theek hai
Customer: theek hai
Executive: to ye wala kam main karwata hun theek hai
Customer: theek hai okay chalo okay
Executive: chal okay
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving calls from IndiaMART.

- No sales through IndiaMART in 4-5 months.

- Buyers respond with no requirement after contact.



Resolution:

- Executive raised internal request for call issue.

- Suggested refreshing recent leads tab frequently.

- Explained how leads are distributed and sold out.

- Executive will cross-check the call issue.



Next Steps: 

- Executive to cross-check the call issue.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, calls, subscription, resolution
